title: Duel of Draws
desc:
Post 2023
- Duel a player for the next 3 rounds after this one ends.
- At the end of the duel, whoever made their opponent draw the most cards, wins.
- Whoever loses gets **Destroyed**.
- If there is a tie, both players get **Destroyed**.
- The duel is cancelled with no effect if either player leaves the game prior to the duel's completion.
